琲字的基本解释

琲
bèi
成串的珠子：“珠琲阑干。”

琲字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bèi］
［《廣韻》蒲罪切，上賄，並。］
(1)珠串子。
(2)珠子。

琲字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【玉字部】　琲； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页735第08
【唐韻】普乃切，音痱。【說文】珠五百枚也。【左思·吳都賦】珠琲闌干。【註】琲，贯也。珠十貫爲一琲。張有曰：草木華未旉，琲磊如珠。　又【廣韻】【集韻】蒲昧切【韻會】蒲妹切【正韻】步昧切，?音佩。又【廣韻】蒲罪切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】部凂切，?音蓓。義?同。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [Jade Character Department] 　琲; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 735 08
[Tang Yun] Pu Naiqie, sound rash. [Said the text] Five hundred beads. [Zuo Si·Wu Du Fu] Zhu Xi Langan. [Note] Xi, Guan Ye. The ten spheres of the bead are one 琲. Zhang You said: The vegetation is not yet blooming, and Yan Lei is like a pearl.　 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] Pu Meiqie [Yunhui] Pu Meiqie [Zheng Yun] Step ambiguously cut,? Yinpei. And [Guang Yun] Pu Sin-cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Bu Li-cut,? Yinbei. Righteous? Same.
